article.Heading: GoM headed by Sushil Modi to look into GSTN portal hiccups
article.Summary: The Group of Ministers (GoM) set up to look into the technical issues faced by goods and services tax network (GSTN), headed by Bihar Deputy Chief Minister Sushil Kumar Modi is holding its first meeting in Bengaluru today.
article.Body:
The Group of Ministers (GoM) set up to look into the technical issues faced by goods and services tax network (GSTN), headed by Bihar Deputy Chief Minister Sushil Kumar Modi is holding its first meeting in Bengaluru today.

Watch accompanying video of CNBC-TV18â€™s Rukmini Rao for all the details.
